comments.raw_text:
When I launch Firefox, it retrieves hundreds of tabs but only loads the last one. After 1-5 seconds the master password prompt opens ; if the browsing hasn't triggered it (I didn't), it must come from an extension, I don't know which one nor what for, so I'm basically blind to give my consent.

I think it would be very useful to display what has triggered the master password prompt :
* which url/domain from which tab
* which extension (for which url/domain if any)
* what else
comments.author: jo@zerezo.com
